scenes.background: You redirected a task to Monica while you were on leave. Bob sees this and comments:
scenes.description: I noticed you passed your task to Monica. Not cool while shes swamped.

options.text: Monica is very capable, I'm sure she can handle it.
options.analysis: You expressed confidence in Monica's abilities, showing social skills, but lacked empathy and self-regulation.

options.text: I didn't realize Monica was that busy. I'll check in with her.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the situation and showed willingness to address it, demonstrating strong perception and empathy.

options.text: If Monica is overwhelmed, she can delegate it to someone else.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution, showing motivation and social skills, but empathy and perception were lower.
